scripts.test: cd ./server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run start"
scripts.lint: cd ./server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.postinstall: cd ./server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test:silent: cd ./server && npm run test -- --silent && cd ../client && npm run test -- --watchAll=false --silent
